content: Yes, I can recommend the Laneige Water Sleeping Mask, which is a gel-type mask that delivers intense hydration without leaving any greasiness or stickiness on the skin. It is formulated with Laneige's signature Hydro Ionized Mineral Water technology, which helps to infuse the skin with essential minerals and nutrients, and also contains soothing ingredients like lavender extract to calm and detoxify the skin. This mask is suitable for all skin types, including combination skin, and can be used as a sleeping mask or as a regular face mask.
